author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fox Factory Holding Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.07
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Fox Factory Holding Corp:
* FOX FACTORY HOLDING CORP ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 TO $0.35
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.66 TO $1.84
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.38
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.07 * SEES FY 2018 SALES $542 MILLION TO $570 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 SALES $121 MILLION TO $127 MILLION * Q4 SALES ROSE 8.6 PERCENT TO $121.1 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.33, REVENUE VIEW $118.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37, REVENUE VIEW $119.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.75, REVENUE VIEW $554.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
